Package entity.roles

Class Applicant

java.lang.Object
entity.roles.User
entity.roles.Applicant
Direct Known Subclasses:
HDBOfficer
public class Applicant extends User
Represents an applicant in the system who can apply for BTO projects, submit enquiries, and manage their applications.
